page.title: 02Education Facilities
page.content:
There are three schools in the area. Speyside High School was completed in 1976 and is a six year comprehensive. It is a Community School serving as a Community Centre for the surrounding area. It has ten feeder Primary schools in the Upper Speyside area. It has between 500 and 600 pupils on its roll.
Aberlour P. School serves the village of Aberlour. It is an old building, opened in the year of Queen Victoria's Jubilee, 1897. It has a roll of 119.
Edinvillie P. School serves the community of Edinvillie and is a two-teacher school with a roll of 22.
